title: Episode 92 w/ Lil' Cease
itunes:title: Episode 92 w/ Lil' Cease
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs! In this episode the guys drink it up with Lil' Cease. The guys discuss the life and legacy of B.I.G., Junior M.A.F.I.A., 2 Pac, Bad Boy, Lil Kim and a lot more. The guys are also joined by Jadakiss who also gives his memories on Biggie and Bad Boy Records. #DrinkChamps --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
